form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: CERTIFICATE# 198177, A SPANISH MARRIAGE CERTIFICATE TRANSLATED TO THE ENGLISH. LANGUAGE.

full_text: Screened by NARA, 4/18/2023 CERTIFICATE# 198177 TO WHO MAY CONCERN: A SPANIH MARRIAGE CIRTIFICATE TRANSLATED TO THE ENGLISH. LANGUAGE. CERTIFIES THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION. BEFORE ME JESUS MA. OCAMPO JAIME MUNICIPAL PRESIDENT AND OFICIAL OF THE CIVIL DEPT OF THIS PLACE. CERTIFIES THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION INFORMATION TAKEN OUT OF THE ORIGINAL REGISTERED MARRIAGE CIRTIFICATE OF THIS PLACE HUEJUQUILLA EL ALTO JALISCO MEXICO, STATES THE FOLLOWING THE YEAR WAS 1956 BOOK 7 PAGE 12 A MARRIAGE CERTIFICATE OFICIALY STATES, ON PAGE 12, A CIVIL MARRIAGE TOOK PLACE THOSE PRESENT WERE , MANUEL HERNANDEZ RAMIREZ AND PETRA DIAZ GONZALEZ WERE MARIED IN HUEJUQUILLA EL ALTO, JALISCO ON THE 17TH HOUR OF THE DAY JANUARY 28, 1956 BY C. EUFEMIO RENTERIA OFICIAL CIVIL JUDGE OF THIS REGION. ADDRESS HOUSE #100 STREET ALLENDE OF THIS TOWN, MARRIED MANUEL HERNANDEZ RAMIREZ A SINGLE MAN AGRICULTURER, MEXICAN OF 23 YEARS OLD, HE KNOWS HOW TO READ AND WRITE. A CITEZEN OF HUEJUQUILLA EL ALTO JALISCO MEXICO. WHOS PRESENT ADDRESS IS RANCH OF MARGARITA. THIS RANCH OF MARGARITA BELONGS TO THE JURISTICTION OF HUEJUQUILLA ELA ALTO JALISCO MEXICO. MANUEL HERNANDEZ RAMIREZ THE ONLY SON OF ANTONIO HERNANDEZ DECEASED. AND LUZ RAMIREZ THATS ALIVE. PETRA DIAZ GONZALEZ SINGLE WITH OUT A PROFESION MEXICAN OF 17 YEARS OF AGE A WELL KNOWN CITEZEN AND NEIGHBOR OF OUR MUNICIPAL JURISTICTION AREA DAUGHTER OF VICTORIO DIAZ AND MARIA GONZALEZ THAT LIVE THAT GAVE THEIR PERMISIO TO HAVE CIVIL MATRIMONY UNITE WELL KNOWING AND AWARE OF THE LAW OF ARTICLE 91 AN CIVIL CODE RELATES TO THE MARIAGE y OF TIS CERTIFICATE OF THIS MARIEAGE. WHICH WILL BE FILED WITH OTHERLEGAL DOCUMENTS. AWITH THIS LEGAL CASE THE INTERESTED THAT WERE PRESENT WERE TOLD AND WAS DISCUSED THE ISSUE OF MATRIMONY THEY WERE ALSO TOLD THAT THIS MARIAGE WAS LEGAL UNDER THE LAW SO THEN DURING THE OFIAL MARIAGE WERE MARIED MANUEL HERNANDEZ RAMIREZ AND PETRA DIAZ GONZALEZ, WITNESSES WERE C.C. AGUSTIN NAVARRETE, SANTOS RAMIRES AND CAMILO RAMIREZ THEY WERE ALL PRESENT DURING THE CEREMONY AND WERE AWARE OF THE PROCEDURES OF THE LAW . THIS CERTIFICATE WAS READ TO THE MENTIONED AVOBE .AND CONFIRMED MR SIR. E. RENTERIA-*MANUEL HERNANDEZ- AGUSTIN NAVARRETE- SANTOS RAMIREZ- CAMILO RAMIREZ. THIS IS A TRU AND CORECT COPY OF THE ORIGINAL THIS DO CUMENT IS LEGAL FOR THE CONCERNED (OVER)
